pageProps.data:
## Upsample ###### Description Your algorithms or other operations may rely on larger input than you have. You may use this operation to solve this, or for any other purposes. ###### Params | Param | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | |**tSrc**|[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)|The source image to be upsampled.| |**coefficient**|number|Upsampling coefficient.| |**type?**|string|Upsampling support two possible variants of interpolation
'nearest', 'bicubic'.| ###### Example ```js // this line enlarge an input image in 3x gm.upsample(inputImage, 3); ```
